q.quote: Youth is the gift of nature, but age is a work of art.
q.author: Stanislaw Jerzy Lec

q.quote: Let us never know what old age is. Let us know the happiness time brings, not count the years.
q.author: Ausonius

q.quote: Age is a case of mind over matter. If you don't mind, it don't matter.
q.author: Satchel Paige

q.quote: Cherish all your happy moments; they make a fine cushion for old age.
q.author: Booth Tarkington

q.quote: Try to keep your soul young and quivering right up to old age.
q.author: George Sand

q.quote: Marriage is not about age; it's about finding the right person.
q.author: Sophia Bush

q.quote: Aging is not lost youth but a new stage of opportunity and strength.
q.author: Betty Friedan

q.quote: The secret of staying young is to live honestly, eat slowly, and lie about your age.
q.author: Lucille Ball

q.quote: The age of a woman doesn't mean a thing. The best tunes are played on the oldest fiddles.
q.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

q.quote: Age is an issue of mind over matter. If you don't mind, it doesn't matter.
q.author: Mark Twain

q.quote: Do not go gentle into that good night but rage, rage against the dying of the light.
q.author: Dylan Thomas

q.quote: Forty is the old age of youth; fifty the youth of old age.
q.author: Victor Hugo

q.quote: Just remember, once you're over the hill you begin to pick up speed.
q.author: Arthur Schopenhauer

q.quote: Age is something that doesn't matter, unless you are a cheese.
q.author: Luis Bunuel
